WorkItem.Description:
It would be great if you can customize installation to have only required files in installation folder.
For example, I only need to work only with Excel2007/2003. I don't need the rest.
So I could choose only to have those files required for Excel2007/2003 to work.
Now my project's library is 39.9MB with 39.4MB Only for PHPExcel.
Â 
There goes my 2 cents.

Comments.Message: The overall size of the file collection will be reduced drastically later this year when I remove tcPDF from the distribution: this accounts for 33.6MB of a total Classes tree size of 40.2MB in the current SVN tree. This year will also see some refactoring of the code, which will reduce this footprint still further.
